statements: SELECT * FROM game_assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_type, COUNT(*) AS asset_count FROM game_assets GROUP BY asset_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE '%sword%';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_url FROM game_assets LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM game_assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Weapon';
SELECT asset_name, asset_data FROM game_assets WHERE asset_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM player_customizations WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT customization_id, customization_type FROM player_customizations ORDER BY customization_id DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, LENGTH(asset_data) AS data_length FROM game_assets WHERE LENGTH(asset_data) > 1000;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, LOWER(asset_type) AS asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type LIKE 'armor%';
SELECT MAX(asset_id) AS max_asset_id, MIN(asset_id) AS min_asset_id FROM game_assets;

SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM assets ORDER BY asset_type DESC, asset_name ASC;

SELECT simulation_name, start_date, end_date FROM game_simulations WHERE completion_status = true;
